changeSet.createView: (SELECT c.id, c.server_client_id, c.member_code, c.name as member_name, c.type, c.member_class_id, c.subsystem_code, c.created_at, c.updated_at, i.xroad_instance, c.member_did FROM security_server_clients c LEFT JOIN identifiers i ON c.server_client_id = i.id WHERE c.type = 'XRoadMember') union (SELECT c.id, c.server_client_id, m.member_code, m.name as member_name, c.type, m.member_class_id, c.subsystem_code, c.created_at, c.updated_at, i.xroad_instance, null FROM security_server_clients c LEFT JOIN security_server_clients m ON c.xroad_member_id = m.id LEFT JOIN identifiers i ON c.server_client_id = i.id WHERE c.type = 'Subsystem');
